Counter-Strike is a interesting game. It has a competitive and casual mode to cater to all kinds of FPS gamers. It's competitive mode queues people up based on their rank which make the matches very fair. However, in the casual queue there is only balancing in the sense that the teams are usually even. The war games are also extraordinarily fun with their modes like gun game and the low gravity SSG-08 matches. The wingman mode is much like the competitive mode in that there are designated ranks that allow for more balanced play with the only difference being that there are two people on each team instead of five which I find makes the game harder. All things considered though, I do like the game and i like the freedom that the different guns allow with different playstyles for each one.
I enjoy game, would probably recommend
